items.title: Official PS5 Black Friday game deals now live: Astro Bot, Spider-Man, Death Stranding 2, Last of Us, much more up to 60% off
items.summary:
Amazon’s Black Friday Week is now live with a host of ongoing console game deals, but today marks the start of the official 2025 PlayStation Black Friday sale. So along with the $100 price drops now live on PS5 Slim, PS5 Pro, the Ghost of Yōtei bundle, and all of the DualSense controllers, we are also seeing a fresh list of deep 60% price drops across PlayStation Studio titles. This includes some of the lowest prices ever on titles like

  • Astro Bot $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Death Stranding 2 $50 (Reg. $70)
  • Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part I $30 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part II Remastered $30 (Reg. $50)
  • Ghost of Tsushima Director’s Cut $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Helldivers 2 $30 (Reg. $40)
  • God of War Ragnarök $20 (Reg. $70)
  • Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart $30 (Reg. $70)
  • MLB The Show 25 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Gran Turismo 7 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • LEGO Horizon Adventures $20 (Reg. $60)
  • Demon’s Souls $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Rise of the Ronin $40 (Reg. $70)

Walmart PS5 Black Friday game deals from $30

Amazon PS5 Black Friday game deals from $30

Target PS5 Black Friday game deals from $30

Best Buy PS5 Black Friday game deals from $30

Official PS5 console Black Friday deals now live

  • PlayStation 5 (slim) $449 (Reg. $550)
  • PlayStation 5 digital edition (slim) $399 (Reg. $500)
  • PlayStation 5 Pro $649 (Reg. $750)
  • PlayStation 5 NBA 2K26 bundle $450 (Reg. $550)
  • PlayStation 5 Ghost of Yōtei bundle $499 (Reg. $599)

items.summary:

Q&A with Roblox co-founder and CEO David Baszucki on using face scans to verify age, having a chat function on Roblox, AI content moderation at scale, and more  —  This week the company announced that it would require users to undergo an A.I.-powered age estimation process in order to chat with others on the platform.

items.title: Environment Department records statements over illegal waste linked to 17 cow deaths in Batu Gajah
items.summary: IPOH: The Environment Department has recorded a statement from a representative of an industrial firm suspected of involvement in the illegal disposal of scheduled waste that led to the deaths of 17 cows in Batu Gajah, on Nov 5. Read full story

items.title: Despite Chinese hacks, Trump’s FCC votes to scrap cybersecurity rules for phone and internet companies
items.summary: Two Trump-appointed FCC officials voted to undo the telecom industry's cybersecurity rules. One Democratic commissioner dissented, saying the decision leaves the United States "less safe" at a time when threats are increasing.

items.title: This Anker 5,000mAh Qi2 MagSafe power bank is among the thinnest we’ve ever seen, now at $38.50 all-time low for Black Friday
items.summary:
As part of the now live Black Friday Week sale event, Anker’s official Amazon storefront is offering its latest ultra-slim Nano 5K Qi2 MagSafe power bank for $38.49 shipped. This battery pack typically goes for $55, so you’re looking at over $16 discount on it right now, which works out to about 30%. This is the lowest we have this unit fetch to date, landing $1.50 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last month. You can get this unit in black, golden, green, and white finishes, and they’re all down to $38.50 low today. Head below for more details along with deals on other Anker chargers for Black Friday.

more…

items.title: EU opens case against Slovakia over constitutional change
items.summary: (Reuters) -The European Commission opened a case against Slovakia on Friday over what it said was a breach of EU law after the country amended its constitution to assert national sovereignty over matters such as gender and family law. Read full story

As part of its now live Black Friday Week sale event, Amazon is offering huge discounts on almost all Samsung monitors, including Odyssey gaming and Smart Monitor models. Many of these are either fresh lows or are back to their lowest prices, and you can save up to 52% by cashing in on these Black Friday prices. The sale even includes some of the newest displays, like this 27-inch Odyssey G60SF 500Hz OLED unit, and the prices for these monitors, believe it or not, are starting at just $80. Head below for a closer look at the deals.

items.title: Anker’s expanded SOLIX Black Friday Sale increases power station savings up to 70% with new lows starting from $150
items.summary:
Anker SOLIX has launched the next phase of its ongoing Black Friday Sale with increased savings up to 70% across its power stations, bundles, and accessories, giving us the best prices we have seen all year – complete with free gifts with select purchases and at certain price thresholds. Among the expanded lineup, you can score the latest F3000 Portable Power Station starting solo at $1,199 shipped and coming with a FREE protective cover ($99 value), matching in price over at Amazon, though you won’t get the cover there. This new model has been on the market since June carrying a $2,599 full price tag, which we’ve seen go as low as $1,399 up until today. Now, with its Black Friday event in full gear, you’re getting an additional $200 discount to a new all-time low price, giving you a total $1,499 in savings this holiday season. Head below for the full rundown of deals while they’re around.

more…

items.title: We love Anker’s 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand with display and it just hit $150 all-time low for Black Friday
items.summary:

This is one of the newer models Anker debuted a couple of months back for $230, and it’s now seeing its steepest price drop yet. Today’s 35% discount takes $80 off its usual going rate, landing it $20 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last month. Both Phantom Gray and White variants have hit the $150 low today, and Anker’s online store is matching the price for them today at $150. It’s one of our favorite 25W Qi2 charging stations at the moment, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

While normally fetching $470 at full price these days, we’ve mostly seen this package keeping between $390 and $350 over the year, with some falls as low as $300, the only two of which happened during both July and October’s Prime Day events. This deal also beats out the one-day-only Target offer on the V8 Origin package, giving you more accessory attachments at the lowest tracked price that hasn’t been seen since Cyber Monday sales in 2024. Head below to get the full rundown on Dyson Black Friday deals while they last.
